data.text:
Mexican-American movie star Kate Del Castillo is an award-winning actress who has gained wide recognition through her numerous stints in Mexican and American films. Beginning her acting career in 1978, the stunning actress has starred in dozens of movies and TV series. She is best appreciated for her appearance in the Telenovela series titled La Reina del Sur as well as Muchachitas, and Duenos del Paraiso, among others.

Amazingly, Kate has recorded several awards in her name; she was ranked among the 50 most beautiful women by People en Espanol magazine. She was also appointed as a representative of the Mexican Human Rights Commission in 2009. Learn more about her biography, family life, celebrity information, and awards below.

Biography of Kate Del Castillo

Actress born as Kate Del Castillo NegreteTrillo on October 23, 1972 in Mexico City. Kate was born to Kate Trillo and her husband, Eric del Castillo, who was a well-known veteran actor in Mexican cinema and soap opera. The amazing actress became interested in performing at an early age, which led her to participate in several shows and theatrical performances in high school. She has dual Mexican and American nationality despite being of white ethnicity.

Professional career

Kate’s career began as early as 1978 when she starred in the movie The Last Escape. She gained great popularity in 1991 after her role in the telenovela series titled Muchachitas. The series aired in several Latin American countries and she also starred in other Telemundo network series such as La Reina del Sur and Dueños del Paraíso series.

Castillo didn’t just act; she also made appearances in music videos such as Nieve de Día, Fuego de Noche, by Ricky Martin in 1995. Argentinian actor Saul Lisazo toured internationally with Kate in 2002 and 2003 with the play Cartas de Amor (Love letters). The actress has received several accolades, including Star of the Year in November 2007. She was voted one of the 25 most influential women in 2011. The beautiful actress has also been recognized by People en Español magazine, a magazine Spanish-language American published by Meredith. Company. The magazine started with a Spanish edition People magazine in 1996.

In 2006, Kate rose to international fame in a Hollywood film titled Frontier City. She was chosen as an ambassador for the Mexican Human Rights Commission in 2009. She proved herself worthy of the position in 2010 when she attended the launch of the Blue Heart Campaign to raise awareness and fight human trafficking . humans. In collaboration with the Vivanco family on November 20, 2015; Kate launched a new brand of tequila named Honor del Castillo

Additionally, Kate has starred in several ad campaigns for the world’s largest cosmetics company. L’Oréal and an American multinational automobile company Ford

The family life of Kate del Castillo

Kate del Castillo was born to Mexican parents Eric del Castillo and his wife Kate Trillo. Meanwhile, she is not her parents’ only daughter; she has two other siblings, Verónica del Castillo, a journalist and half-brother named Ponciano del Castillo.

While the incredible actress has been successful in her career, she has also had an interesting love life. She has been married twice and divorced twice. Her first marriage was to a Mexican soccer player named Luis Garcia. In 2001, after a brief relationship and three years of successful marriage, the two men separated. She then married a Mexican actor named Aaron Diaz in 2009. After they got married, their relationship didn’t last long before drowning in the mud. They separated two years later in 2011. Their divorce process was finalized in 2012.

Additionally, Kate del Castillo has also been romantically linked with other stars including Emilio Azcarraga Jean and Sean Penn; as well as Demian Bichir and Ari Telch. Apparently Kate didn’t make it down the aisle for the third time. She is currently focusing on the high point of her career.

Celebrity Facts and Awards

The Mexican-American actress has been so wonderful since the beginning of her career and she has registered several awards in her name. In 1995, she won the Best Young Actress award for her impressive performance on Imperio de Cristal. Kate also received the Best Actress award in 2006 for her excellent work on American Visa. In 2008, she received the Best Actress award for her work on La Reina del Sur, among others.

The movie star has starred alongside popular stars in Hollywood, including Jennifer Lopez; James Brolin, Idris Elba, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Chace Crawford and Beau Bridges. Kate has been embroiled in a bit of controversy involving Mexican drug Lord named Joaquin Guzman Loera, otherwise known as El Chapo. Since 2016, the actress has not returned to her home country of Mexico; this is due to a court order seeking to arrest and question the actress in connection to El Chapo.
